verbs.description: Special counsel Robert Mueller [V: has] given a list of almost four dozen questions to lawyers for President Donald Trump as part of his investigation into Russian meddling in the 2016 election and whether Trump obstructed justice , according to a report .

[ARG0: Special counsel Robert Mueller] has [V: given] [ARG1: a list of almost four dozen questions] [ARG2: to lawyers for President Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: as part of his investigation into Russian meddling in the 2016 election and whether Trump obstructed justice] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a report] .

Special counsel Robert Mueller has given a list of almost four dozen questions to lawyers for President Donald Trump as part of his investigation into Russian meddling in the 2016 election and whether Trump obstructed justice , [V: according] to a report .
